patch 8.2.1397: Vim9: return type of maparg() not adjusted for fourth arg

Problem:    Vim9: return type of maparg() not adjusted for fourth argument.
Solution:   Check if fourth argument is present. (closes #6645)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1397: Vim9: return type of maparg() not adjusted for fourth… · vim/vim@4a6d1b6

attachments.text: … arg Problem: Vim9: return type of maparg() not adjusted for fourth argument. Solution: Check if fourth argument is present. (closes #6645)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/daa2f36573db3e1df7eb1fdbc3a09a2815644048|patch 8.2.1398: autoload script sourced twice if sourced directly>
patch 8.2.1398: autoload script sourced twice if sourced directly

Problem:    Autoload script sourced twice if sourced directly.
Solution:   Do not source an autoload script again. (issue #6644)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1398: autoload script sourced twice if sourced directly · vim/vim@daa2f36
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1398: autoload script sourced twice if sourced directly · vim/vim@daa2f36
attachments.text: Problem: Autoload script sourced twice if sourced directly. Solution: Do not source an autoload script again. (issue #6644)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/efa94447e85eacce62c1fcf6b63e7f3431e2cb1b|patch 8.2.1399: Vim9: may find imported item in wrong script>
patch 8.2.1399: Vim9: may find imported item in wrong script

Problem:    Vim9: may find imported item in wrong script.
Solution:   When looking up script-local function use the embedded script ID.
            (issue #6644)
